args: Zardin traveled the continent, offering his skills\nas a beautician to all he met. After much effort...
At long last, I have everything I need for\nmy new line of cosmetics!
Gel alone cannot bring out the beauty\nin others. I require makeup as well!
Ah, but it was far from easy.
I collected rare medicinal herbs from\na mighty and manly fairy...
And there was the dragon I brought\nto tears with my lectures on beauty...
Oh, and I jumped off a waterfall—\nWITHOUT a harness—just to collect\nsome rare scales.
Had I been less beautiful, I surely would\nhave perished.
But I have reveled in my triumph\nlong enough. I must finish my\nnew line of cosmetics!
...Now, it is time for me to reveal the\nfruits of my labors to the world!
Whoa! Hey Zardin.\nI haven't seen you in a while.
Indeed! I was busy perfecting my\nUltra Zardin Cosmetics—which I\nshall reveal here today!
A makeup line?\nHow surprisingly orthodox of you.
Save your surprise; you are about to\nwitness my beautiful mastery at work.
What the—how's he movin' so fast?!
First, I gently apply foundation blended\nwith dragon tears.
Then comes a layer of vividly-colored\nmakeup...
And finally, it's all covered in a\nrainbow-scale compound.
Add a light spritz, and—voila!\nMy ultimate creation!
Wh-where is this light coming from?!\nI can't see a thing!
Well? Am I not simply stunning?
It's too much, Zardin! Take it off!
What?! You would have me reduce\nmy own beauty, after all I endured\nto achieve it?!
As you, er, saw, even a modest application\ncan make one so beautiful they actually\nemit light.
They can make a person so beautiful\nthey actually emit light. From their face.
I think he's finally lost it.
Well, whatever happened, it was crippling;\nwe can't have you going around blinding\neveryone.
Indeed. It would be especially troublesome\nin combat.
Hm. It would certainly make life harder\nfor everyone.
Could you maybe adjust the recipe to make\nthose cosmetics slightly less...effective?
But to do so would be self-sabotage!\nI would be casting myself further from\nmy goal of achieving ultimate beauty.
Listen. Yer tryin' to make everyone\nbeautiful, yeah?
Quite right. I have no intention of holding\na monopoly on such a basic human right.
Then pull back on the shininess.\nNobody'll be able to appreciate yer\nwork if they can't see, ya know?
With a new variety of cosmetics completed,\nZardin organizes a public demonstration.
What say you, my lady?\nIs your beauty not flawless?
Oh... Goodness, I hardly recognize myself!
I'll be back to see you soon, Mr. Zardin!
People seem to like your new cosmetics.
Indeed they do, {player_name}!\nAnd I grow ever more beautiful as a result.
Though it pains me not to be able to use\nmy Ultra Zardin Cosmetics...
I think you've struck a nice balance with\nthese regular-strength ＂Zardin Cosmetics.＂
It's not bad, but my beauty grows more\nslowly for having lowered its potency.
Must I truly forsake the Ultra version?
Yes. In fact, you should lock them away.
Am I not doing my customers a disservice,\ndenying them such radiance?
They would do more harm than\ngood, Zardin.
Ugh... Why don't you all understand?!\nI simply wish to be more beautiful!
What other option do we have?
Only you can use the Ultra variant,\nafter all.
(Shhh. I'm trying to resolve this for good.)

Your Ultra Zardin Cosmetics are simply
too powerful. Anyone who isn't
exceptionally beautiful to begin with
would only end up damaging their skin.
So we must lock them away. Only you\nshould use them, and ONLY when\nabsolutely necessary.
You're... You're right! In that case,\nwe have no other course of action!
All this time, it was only I who had \nthe proper potential...
I owe you a great debt, Cleo.
Say the word, and I shall coax out\nall the beauty that sleeps within you!\nYou really shouldn't hide your ears...
Phew... That should save us all\na good deal of trouble.
Really? A light that bright might\nmake for a decent party trick! Ha ha!
